text: Luigi "Gigi" Proietti (2 November 1940 â€“ 2 November 2020) was an Italian actor, comedian, director, musician, singer, and television presenter. He was born in Rome. His career began in 1955. He was best known for his roles in Febbre da cavallo, Lady Liberty and in Brancaleone at the Crusades. Proietti died in Rome on 2 November 2020 from a heart attack, aged 80.Morto Gigi Proietti, addio al grande mattatore della scena italiana ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian comedians Category:Musicians from Rome Category:Italian television presenters Category:Actors from Rome Category:Singers from Rome Category:Italian pop singers
title: Gigi Proietti
